name: SigmaMerge
description:
For some reason I can't load the results from other versions of the mix, so I added them as Training Data.

This mix was created of all good models i've seen here. (It's like more 30 mb.)
So. I tried to make a model that will do almost everything without requiring anything.

The prompts for the works that are given as an example were taken from the open source works on Leonardo Ai, except for the girl in the bikini.
The best basic prompts I use:
Positive: {{{masterpiece}}}, {{detailed}}, {detailed background}, {best quality}, high quality, high-definition, 4k, lights, glares, {detailed eyes}
Negative: {{{monochrome}}}, {{background distortion}}, {{bad anatomy}}, {{bad hands}}, {more than two legs}, {more than two arms}, {missing fingers}, {crooked fingers}, {extra digit}, {bad shadows}, fewer digits, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, lowres, text

This model works great with various texture inversions, LoRa, ControlNet and others, so everything is limited only by your desire to achieve the ideal.
If you are as crazy as me and will use sigma for an even bigger mix, then share the good results of obtained models.
